name: Validate Next available actions for "Mark as Non-Renewable" transaction

testSteps.description: When underwriter is on home page
And policy status should be 'In Force'

Then below Actions should be displayed
| Cancellation |
| Change Name and Address |
| Final Audit |
| Audit Non Compliance |
| Quote for Endorsement |
| Endorse |
| Conditional Renewal |
| Reverse Endorsement |
| Inquire |
And Underwriter selects mark as non renewal transaction on policy
